channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on opsforce

item.title: Deploy kubernetes [Continually updating]
item.description: Architecture Tutorial Deploy docker-engine 1.12.6 on ubuntu 16.04 xenial [all node] $ sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://p80.pool.sks-keyservers.net:80 --recv-keys 58118E89F3A912897C070ADBF76221572C52609D $ sudo apt-add-repository 'deb https://apt.dockerproject.org/repo ubuntu-xenial main' $ sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-cache policy docker-engine # find docker-engine version you need to install docker-engine: Installed: (none) Candidate: 17.05.0~ce-0~ubuntu-xenial Version table: 17.05.0~ce-0~ubuntu-xenial 500 500 https://apt.dockerproject.org/repo ubuntu-xenial/main amd64 Packages 17.04.0~ce-0~ubuntu-xenial 500 500 https://apt.dockerproject.org/repo ubuntu-xenial/main amd64 Packages 17.03.1~ce-0~ubuntu-xenial 500 500 https://apt.
